layout:1`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:NEW TO MAFIA?

NO WORRIES…

SWIPE RIGHT TO LEARN MORE

layout:1`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:YOU AND YOUR PARTY LIVE IN A TOWN. EVERY NIGHT THE BAD GUY(S) AKA THE MAFIA TERRORIZES THE CITIZENS OF THE TOWN. DURING THE DAY, THE CITIZENS STRUGGLE TO FIND AND KILL THE MAFIA\n\nBEFORE IT\'S TOO LATE…
layout:1`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:BEFORE YOU ENTER YOUR RANDOMLY GENERATED TOWN, YOU MUST PROVIDE SOME INFORMATION
layout:3`|text1Size:36`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:ENTER THE NUMBER OF PLAYERS IN YOUR PARTY`|img1:tutorial_card_c2`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:USE OR DON\'T USE SPECIAL CHARACTERS IN YOUR GAME\n\nPRESS THE INFO BUTTON FOR DESCRIPTIONS`|img1:tutorial_card_c3`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:PASS YOUR DEVICE TO EACH PLAYER\n\nHAVE THEM SET UP A PROFILE PICTURE AND FIND OUT THEIR ROLE`|img1:tutorial_card_c4`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:LISTEN TO THE RANDOMLY GENERATED STORY TO BECOME IMMERSED IN YOUR GAME`|img1:tutorial_card_c5`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:DURING THE NIGHT PHASE, EVERYONE SHOULD CLOSE THEIR EYES, EXCEPT THE MODERATOR`|img1:tutorial_card_c6`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center
layout:3`|text1Size:36`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:YOUR DEVICE WILL CALL UPON THE SPECIAL CHARACTERS OF THE GAME`|img1:tutorial_card_c7`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:26`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:THE SPECIFIED PERSON SHOULD OPEN THEIR EYES AND NOTIFY THE MODERATOR OF THEIR TARGET`|img1:tutorial_card_c7`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center
layout:1`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:MAKE SURE NOT TO MAKE ANY NOISE, WHEN NOTIFYING THE MODERATOR OF YOUR SELECTION\n\nIT COULD BE A FATAL MISTAKE
layout:3`|text1Size:36`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:MARK THE TARGET ON THE SCREEN AND CONFIRM`|img1:tutorial_card_c9`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center
layout:3`|text1Size:36`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:THE NIGHT IS OVER, BUT NOW YOU MUST FACE THE DAY`|img1:tutorial_card_c10`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:3`|text1Size:22`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:top`|text1:THE TOWN MUST EXECUTE ONE PERSON…\n\nDISCUSS AMONGST YOURSELVES, EXCLUDING THE MODERATOR WHO MUST BE KILLED`|img1:tutorial_card_c12`|img1MaxHeight:240`|img1ScaleType:fit_center

layout:2`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:bottom`|text1:IF THE CITIZENS KILL ALL THE MAFIA(S), THE CITIZENS WIN`|text2Size:40`|text2Color:red`|text2gravity:top`|text2:IF THE MAFIA OUTNUMBER THE CITIZENS, THE MAFIA WINS
layout:1`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:THE NIGHT AND DAY CYCLES WILL REPEAT, UNTIL AN END GAME SCENARIO OCCURS

layout:1`|text1Size:36`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:NOW THAT YOU UNDERSTAND THE BASIC RULES OF MAFIA RISING, ENTER INTO A WORLD WHERE YOUR FRIENDS MAY NOT APPEAR AS THEY SEEM
layout:1`|text1Size:40`|text1Color:white`|text1gravity:center_vertical`|text1:BUT THEY\'RE ALSO YOUR FRIENDS, SO DON\'T BE A JERK ;)

resources.string: Citizens are the main inhabitants of the town. Unlike the other roles, citizens do not have any special powers. Their role, however, is not to be frowned upon for they have the opportunity to vote during the tribunal. During the tribunal, citizens typically make up the majority of voters.

The doctor is the healer of the party. Every round, he has a chance to protect the citizens of his city. At night, the doctor indicates to the moderator one person whom he wants to protect. If the mafia chooses a victim and the victim is protected by the doctor, the victim will survive the night. Doctors are allowed to target themselves.

The mafia is the villain in Mafia Rising. There can be a single mafia or multiple mafia in one game. In the beginning, the mafia will know who each other are, but they will have no information on any of the other roles. During the night phase, every mafia must agree on one person to try murdering. During the day phase, the mafia will be trying to deceive the non-mafia players by framing other players and drawing suspicion away from the actual mafia. To win, the mafia must murder enough non-mafia to become the majority.

The moderator creates an immersive story for the players to play in. By interacting with various characters in the game, the moderator controls the game\'s progression. Also, the moderator may add sound effects to dramatize the game experience.

The police\'s duty is to investigate the criminals of the town. At night, the police indicates to the moderator who he wants to suspect. If the police has correctly identified the mafia, the moderator will notify the police with a nod. If the police has not correctly identified the mafia, the moderator will notify the police with a shake of the head. During the day, the police will use the information gathered to sway public opinion to direct the public eye to the mafia without revealing himself in order to escape the murderous hand of the mafia.
